meanings.sent1: The constant rain was a determent to our picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: Financial issues can be a determent to starting a new business.
meanings.sent3: The broken umbrella was a determent to staying dry in the storm.
meanings.sent4: Lack of motivation acted as a determent to her success.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise was a determent to her concentration.

meanings.sent1: Time constraints are determents to completing the project on time.
meanings.sent2: Lack of resources can be a determent to achieving your goals.
meanings.sent3: His fear of failure became a determent to taking risks.
meanings.sent4: The strict rules acted as determents to creativity.
meanings.sent5: Negative feedback can serve as determents to self-confidence.

meanings.sent1: The locked gate was a determent to entering the garden.
meanings.sent2: Language barriers can be determents to effective communication.
meanings.sent3: The steep hill posed a determent to the hikers' progress.
meanings.sent4: The lack of experience acted as a determent to getting the job.
meanings.sent5: The heavy traffic was a determent to reaching the destination on time.
